subject: [Mhln] Economic Events & Analysis
body:
DPWI Announces South East Asian Division! 
Distributed Power Inc. 
Symbol: 
Price:  <$0.14> 
DPWI has opened a division in South East Asia to explore and develop oil, gas, and green energy opportunities in Asia and the Pacific Rim.
These guys are on the move. Look for more news next week and get on DPWI first thing Monday!
